betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§oAll in one! This Quest describes the Tungsten Chain.§r

§aTungsten§r is obtained from either §eTungstate§r or §eScheelite§r, which are part of the same vein in the End.

Just like the §dRutile§r chain, you will only need to input one item type, and everything else will be looped perfectly!

You will need:
§9-§r One §3Chemical Bath§r, to make §dTungstic Acid§r.
§9-§r One §3Electrolyzer§r, to electrolyze §oboth§r Bath outputs.
§9-§r One §3Chemical Reactor§r, to loop back §dHydrogen§r and §dChlorine§r into §aHydrochloric Acid§r.

You will be granted either Calcium or Lithium as Byproduct, that's free of charge!


§bLore:§r In GTCE, Tungstate or Scheelite took 40sec and 4 Hydrogen buckets at 1920 EU/t to electrolyze into 1 Tungsten Dust. Even if it was simpler, it was much more ridiculously expensive! This new chain is great.
